metadata.Title: CVE-2023-27320 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Sudo before 1.9.13p2 has a double free in the per-command chroot feature.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-27320` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

sudo - 1.9.11p3-1ubuntu1.2
sudo-ldap - 1.9.11p3-1ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

notes.Note: alexmurray> CHROOT support was only added in 1.9.3, and this issue only affects sudo versions 1.9.8 through to 1.9.13p1

criterions.comment: sudo package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.11p3-1ubuntu1.2').
